titleStmt.title: A pindarick poem on the happy coronation of His Most Sacred Majesty James II and his illustrious consort Queen Mary by Mrs. Behn.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Playford for Henry Playford ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Differs from Wing B1753 only in that there is added a stanza, numbered XVIII, beginning "Behold the Royal Hero" and that stanza no. XXVIII in B1753, beginning "And now the Earthly God" is omitted.
